pages.title: Mana Ore
pages.text: The Mana Ore is the most powerful ore in the magical world, you can create spells, machines, and more !

pages.title: Mana Ore
pages.text: The Mana Ore can be found underground the Magic Forest biome in y-40, it quite rare but we can feel is magic power in our hands after mining it

pages.title: Impure Mana
pages.text: The Impure Mana is what you obtain after smelting or mining the Mana Ore if you want to use it you have to purify it in a $(l:machines/purifier#ore)Purifier $(/l)

pages.title: Solidified Mana
pages.text: The Solidified Mana is the result of the purified Mana, it have all the magic properties and can be used in multiple recipes, spells and lot more
